song_name: All in the Suit That You Wear
lyrics:
4 contributorsall in the suit that you wear lyricsverse 1
hey you someone said you were lost out there
in the grip tryin to strangle us all down here
in the meantime are you ever goin to set us free
hey you will we ever get out of here

prechorus
are you ever gonna surrender do you even care
wasnt talkin bout a sweet submission it wasnt even there

chorus
all in the suit that you wear
when youre lookin for something
its in the suit that you wear
when youre hidin from someone
all in the suit that you wear
when you wear it

verse 2
hey you you keep awalkin the razor
on the edge you cut your feet when you stand in there
in the meantime theres always someone to set you free
hey you will you ever get out of there

prechorus
are you ever gonna surrender do you even care
wasnt talkin bout a sweet submission it wasnt even there
you might also likechorus
all in the suit that you wear
when youre lookin for something
its in the suit that you wear
when youre hidin from someone
all in the suit that you wear
when you wear it

bridge
in the suit that you wear all in the suit that you wear

in the suit that you wear all in the suit that you wear
in the suit that you wear all in the suit that you wear
